episodes.content: The best of today's sumo! Enjoy daily highlights of this dynamic sport with background info and play-by-play commentary adding to the excitement!
episodes.description: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from Nov.15, Day 8 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.
episodes.subtitle: November Tournament Day 8 (Halfway Point)
episodes.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
